TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Skaru, title = Skaru, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skaru} }

S.FORM: alang Skaru ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Gpho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 78 buwan, 152 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 40% kyan ku 61 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 60% kyan ku 91 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 37%, saySiyat 3%, Bunun 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. pzyux iyal sqi nya syaw tuqi na Skaru. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Skaru hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Skaru hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Skaru hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Skaru hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Skaru hya' ga Sansaru. tay mkyahu' na Skaru hya' ga Kukung. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Skaro ga niya mki sko Sincik Keng ato Gpho go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 78 bowan, 152 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 40% kyan ko 61 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 60% kyan ko 91 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 37%, saySiyat 3%, Bonon 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. pzyox iyal sqi nya syaw toqi na Skaro. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Skaro hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Skaro hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Skaro hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Skaro hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Skaro hya' ga Sansaro. tay mkyaho' na Skaro hya' ga Kokong. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
